translation.Message_0_Page_0: Before entering the bunker it is recommended you obtain nightvision first, you will have a hard time without it. The bunker is composed of three segments, each unlocked by a separate key that you will need to find.
translation.Message_0_Page_1: You can find the entrance to the first bunker segment at the radar station. The last segment of the bunker is a deadzone so make sure to have gasmask besides the nightvision if you plan on going there.
